JavaCool303

Class Cool303Theme

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCool303.Cool303Theme

  • public class Cool303Theme
extends java.lang.Object
    A Cool303Theme is a collection of two styles: -A style for boxes (i.e., Cool303Boxes), whereupon we can style the background and the border -A style for non-container components (e.g., Cool303Button), whereupon we can style the component's background, border, and any text it might display

      Constructs a new Cool303Theme.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cool303Theme

        public Cool303Theme(java.awt.Color boxColor,
                    javax.swing.border.Border boxBorder,
                    java.awt.Color componentColor,
                    javax.swing.border.Border componentBorder,
                    java.awt.Font componentFont,
                    java.awt.Font titleFont)
        Constructs a new Cool303Theme. For any attribute not provided, Cool303 will revert to the default attribute provided by the Swing Look-and-Feel in use.
        Parameters:
        boxColor - Background color for all Cool303Boxes
        boxBorder - Border (style) for all Cool303Boxes
        componentColor - Background color for all non-container Cool303Components
        componentBorder - Border (style) for all non-container Cool303Components
        componentFont - Font for all non-container Cool303Components
        titleFont -
